titles.title: Be still and know that I am God,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Be still and know that I am God,
Be still and know that I am God,
Be still and know that I am God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the Lord that healeth thee,
(x3)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
In Thee, O Lord, do fxI put my trust,
(x3)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My life is hid with Christ in God,
(x3)
